DOC.brief_summary: The Northwest Coalition Adolescent Health ( NWCAH ) replicate Teen Outreach Program ( TOP ) five state across pacific northwest include Idaho , Alaska , Montana , Oregon , Washington . The purpose study measure : end program year , TOP student less likely control group student report ever pregnant cause someone pregnant ?
DOC.brief_title: Replication Teen Outreach Program Pacific Northwest
DOC.detailed_description: TOP youth development service learn program youth age 12 17 design reduce teenage pregnancy increase school success help youth develop positive self-image , life management skill , realistic goal . The TOP program model consist three component implemented school , school , community setting nine month : ( 1 ) weekly curriculum session , ( 2 ) community service learning , ( 3 ) positive adult guidance support . The TOP Changing Scenes Curriculum separate four age-/stage-appropriate level , Level 1 typically youth age 12 13 Level 4 typically youth age 17 . The curriculum focus presence consistent , care adult ; supportive peer group ; skill development ; sexual health ; sexual behavior choice . The intended program dosage participant minimum 25 weekly session ( one per week 40-50 minute ) least 20 hour community service learn nine month . One two facilitator , plan order session base needs interest youth , implement TOP group 10 25 youth . In cluster randomize control trial , middle high school student randomly assign class level either TOP treatment group CV control group . After class eligibility determine , TOP facilitator begin consent process . Both active parental consent student assent require student participate study . The consent process regardless whether TOP CV program deliver already-formed class , pull-out school day , school . The parental consent form clearly state student eligible participate one two program , would determine chance . In sign form , parent consented participation program evaluation . Random assignment class technically occur completion baseline administration survey , student could either add subtracted class list time survey administration . No one outside PRA inform outcome random assignment baseline survey administer . All student , TOP CV , follow two year . They complete total three survey ( baseline , post-survey end school year , follow-up survey spring year follow intervention ) . Data collect group , questionnaire read aloud student . When student absent move , interview also complete telephone student give link complete survey online .
